tool_description: Geo-political data by  provinces,districts and municipalities
name: Nepal Address
title: Nepal Address

api_list.name: GetAllProvinces
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nepal-address3.p.rapidapi.com/province"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nepal-address3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
